Package org.apache.lucene.facet.enhancements.params

Enhanced category features

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EnhancementsIndexingParams
    Facet indexing parameters for defining category enhancements.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultEnhancementsIndexingParams
    Default implementation of EnhancementsIndexingParams

Package org.apache.lucene.facet.enhancements.params Description

Enhanced category features

FacetIndexingParams used by EnhancementsDocumentBuilder for adding CategoryEnhancement's to the indexing parameters, and accessing them during indexing and search.
